title: Cif Cleanboost Power & Shine Bathroom Spray 100% soap scum & limescale removal for cleaning ceramic, chrome, enamel, plastic, and stainless-steel surfaces 700 ml Bulk Buy (2)
features: Cif Power & Shine Bathroom Spray removes 100% of limescale and soap scum on bathroom surfaces
This bathroom spray is suitable for cleaning ceramic, chrome, enamel, plastic, and stainless-steel surfaces
Our bathroom cleaner contains a 100% naturally sourced cleaning agent and has a 100% bio-degradable fragrance that leaves no harsh smells
Made with water and dirt-repellent technology, Cif Power & Shine Bathroom Spray is tough on dirt and limescale
Powered with Cleanboost technology, Power & Shine Bathroom Spray leaves your bathroom surfaces with a 100% streak-free shine
The bottle for this cleaning spray is 100% recyclable and made with recycled plastic*
description: CIF Power and Shine Bathroom Spray, 700ml New Cif Power and Shine Bathroom give a deep clean with an unbeatable streak-free shine, first time, every time. Provides 100% soapscum and limescale removal, and 100% streak-free shine! Its powerful deep cleaning molecules instantly start to lift away even the toughest kitchen dirt, such as grease. Immediately you will enjoy your sparkling and beautiful surfaces with no streak-marks left at all! Dermatologically tested. Keep away from children and avoid contact with the eyes. Always read instructions. Water and dirt repellent technology New improved formula for 100% soap scum and limescale removal 100% streak-free shine Lan amazing shine on surfaces for beautiful results How to use Cif Power & Shine Bathroom Spray: Spray onto the surface, leave for a few seconds, and then wipe with a cloth. For tough dirt, leave for a few minutes before wiping. For delicate surfaces and materials, any new/unusual type of usage, painted surfaces, and aluminum, first test the product in an inconspicuous area, rinse immediately after use and avoid heavy rubbing.
